message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to me due to its unique features and the years of expertise that went into its creation. Given its worth to you stands at $800,000, I believe we can find common ground. My proposal is to offer the product to you at a price of $950,000. This allows you to acquire an asset that is not only valuable but also comes with a substantial discount compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss this further.
